ðŸ”¶ Responsibilities:
ðŸ”· Pocket (Loyalty Point App):

ðŸ”¹Played a key role in the development of the Pocket loyalty point app, focusing on enhancing user engagement and retention.
ðŸ”¹Designed and implemented features to gamify the user experience, increasing user interaction and loyalty program participation.
ðŸ”¹Integrated third-party APIs to enable seamless redemption of loyalty points across a diverse range of partner platforms.
ðŸ”¹Collaborated with the design team to ensure a visually appealing and intuitive user interface, resulting in positive user feedback and increased usage metrics.
ðŸ”¹Conducted performance optimization and bug fixing to ensure a smooth and responsive user experience across various devices.

ðŸ”· Yoma Connect (HR Software):

ðŸ”¹Led the development efforts for Yoma Connect, an innovative HR software solution aimed at streamlining employee management processes.
ðŸ”¹Designed and implemented modules for employee onboarding, performance management, and time tracking, tailored to the specific needs of clients.
ðŸ”¹Worked closely with HR professionals to gather requirements and iterate on features to align with industry best practices and regulatory compliance.
ðŸ”¹Integrated advanced analytics and reporting functionalities to provide HR managers with actionable insights into workforce trends and performance metrics.
ðŸ”¹Provided ongoing support and maintenance for Yoma Connect, including troubleshooting and implementing software updates to address evolving user needs and requirements.

ðŸ”¶ Responsibilities:
ðŸ”· Food Order Customer App:

ðŸ”¹Led the development team in creating a user-friendly and intuitive food order customer app for iOS and Android platforms.
ðŸ”¹Designed and implemented features such as menu browsing, order placement, payment processing, and order tracking.
ðŸ”¹Integrated geolocation services for accurate restaurant discovery and delivery estimation.

ðŸ”· Restaurant App:

ðŸ”¹Implemented features for menu customization, table management, and inventory tracking to streamline restaurant operations.
ðŸ”¹Integrated payment gateways and order management systems to facilitate seamless transactions and order fulfillment.
ðŸ”¹Conducted training sessions for restaurant staff on app usage and provided ongoing technical support.

ðŸ”· Biker/Rider Food Delivery App:

ðŸ”¹Architected and developed a robust food delivery app for bikers/riders, enabling efficient order assignment, navigation, and delivery tracking.
ðŸ”¹Implemented features for real-time order updates, route optimization, and proof of delivery confirmation.
ðŸ”¹Optimized app performance for low-bandwidth environments to ensure reliable operation in all conditions.

ðŸ”· Food Order Website:

ðŸ”¹Led the development of a responsive and scalable food order website, catering to desktop and mobile users.
ðŸ”¹Designed and implemented features such as user registration, restaurant search, and order management.
ðŸ”¹Utilized modern web technologies to create a seamless user experience across devices.

ðŸ”· Order Management Dashboard:

ðŸ”¹Implemented features for order tracking, inventory management, and sales reporting.

ðŸ”· Real-time Rider Tracking Website:

ðŸ”¹Built a real-time rider tracking website to enable customers to monitor the status of their orders and track delivery progress.
ðŸ”¹Integrated with the biker/rider app to fetch live location updates and estimated arrival times.

ðŸ”· Tech Stack

ðŸ”¹PHP (Laravel), React.js, Vue.js, Node.js, Flutter (Android, iOS), Docker, DigitalOcean

ðŸ”¶ Responsibilities:

ðŸ”· Real Estate Website:
ðŸ”¹Implemented advanced search functionalities, allowing users to filter properties based on criteria such as location, price range, and amenities.

ðŸ”· Real Estate Customer App (Android, iOS):
ðŸ”¹Architected and developed a cross-platform real estate customer app for Android and iOS devices, providing users with on-the-go access to property listings and agent contacts.
ðŸ”¹Implemented features such as property search, saved searches, and push notifications for new listings matching user preferences.
ðŸ”¹Integrated with geolocation services to provide location-based property recommendations and neighborhood information.

ðŸ”¶ Responsibilities:

ðŸ”¹Building a directory website with big data capabilities involves integrating features that leverage large volumes of data efficiently to provide valuable insights and enhance user experience.
ðŸ”¹Implement a powerful search engine capable of handling complex queries across a vast dataset.
ðŸ”¹Allow users to search by various criteria such as location, category, keyword, ratings, and more.
ðŸ”¹Utilize autocomplete and suggest functionalities to enhance search efficiency.

ðŸ”¹Incorporate geospatial search capabilities to allow users to search for listings based on proximity to a specific location or geographic area.

ðŸ”¹Allow users to contribute content by submitting listings, reviews, ratings, and photos.
ðŸ”¹Implement caching mechanisms and load balancing techniques to optimize performance and ensure responsiveness.
ðŸ”¹Monitor system performance and scalability metrics proactively and implement optimizations as needed.

ðŸ”¹Integrate with external data sources such as APIs, databases, and web scraping tools to augment directory listings with additional data and enrich search results.

ðŸ”¶ Responsibilities:
ðŸ”· ERP V5 Internal Accounting System:

ðŸ”¹Spearheaded the development and implementation of the ERP V5 Internal Accounting System, encompassing modules such as Sales Ledger, Purchase Ledger, General Ledger, Warehouse System, and Final Report.
ðŸ”¹Conducted thorough testing and quality assurance to ensure the reliability, accuracy, and security of the accounting system.
ðŸ”¹Provided ongoing support and maintenance, including troubleshooting and enhancements, to optimize system performance and user experience.

ðŸ”· YKKO Waiter App (Web App):

ðŸ”¹Led the development of the YKKO Waiter App, a web-based application designed to streamline order management and enhance customer service in restaurant settings.
ðŸ”¹Worked closely with YKKO restaurant staff to understand workflow requirements and design intuitive user interfaces for order entry, table management, and bill processing.
ðŸ”¹Implemented real-time communication features to facilitate seamless coordination between waitstaff, kitchen staff, and cashiers, reducing order processing times and improving customer satisfaction.
ðŸ”¹Integrated with existing POS systems and payment gateways to enable secure and efficient payment processing.
ðŸ”¹Conducted usability testing and gathered feedback from end-users to iterate on app features and optimize user experience.

ðŸ”¶ Responsibilities:

ðŸ”· iStock Inventory Control System:

ðŸ”¹Designed and developed features for inventory tracking, stock replenishment, and warehouse management, leveraging technologies such as barcode scanning and RFID.
ðŸ”¹Implemented real-time inventory monitoring and reporting functionalities to provide stakeholders with actionable insights into inventory levels and trends.
ðŸ”¹Continuously monitored system performance and implemented optimizations to enhance scalability, reliability, and efficiency.

ðŸ”· iLedger Accounting System:

ðŸ”¹Designed and implemented modules for general ledger, accounts payable, accounts receivable, and financial reporting, ensuring accuracy and reliability of financial data.
ðŸ”¹Conducted regular audits and reconciliations to verify the accuracy of financial transactions and balances recorded in the Accounting System.
ðŸ”¹Provided training and support to finance staff on system usage, accounting principles, and best practices to optimize productivity and accuracy.
